description: Inverse Moebius transform of Pascal's triangle A007318.
links: Index entries for triangles and arrays related to Pascal's triangle
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := DivisorSum[GCD[k, n], Binomial[n/#, k/#] &]; T[0, 0] = 1; Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 12}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 02 2015 *)
prog: (PARI)T(n,k) = if(n<=0, n==0, sumdiv(gcd(n,k), d, binomial(n/d,k/d) ) );/* print triangle: */{ for (n=0, 17, for (k=0, n, print1(T(n,k),", "); ); print(); ); }/* _Joerg Arndt_, Oct 21 2012 */
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jun 09 2000
